text:
Kim Kardashian West. Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images

Last week, Kim Kardashian West was accused of cultural appropriation over her Aaliyah Haughton Halloween costume, which was meant to resemble the late singer's outfit from her "Try Again" music video.

On November 3, the reality TV star apologized for the costume on her website — but now people are taking issue with her response.

"I saw online that some people thought my costume was in poor taste and I am truly sorry if that offended anyone, but I wasn't dressing up as a race or culture but rather as a woman whom I admire," she wrote.

Kim went on to say that she didn't intend to offend anyone with her costume. "We don't see color in my home. It's all love and respect," she wrote.

Now, people are taking issue with her apology.

This was one of Kim's four elaborate, musician-inspired Halloween costumes.

Although she dressed as Cher and Madonna without incident, the reality TV star faced additional accusations of cultural appropriation over her Selena Quintanilla costume.

However, Kim did not address those claims in her apology.

Instead, she concluded her statement by repeating what she said on Twitter earlier that week: "We are just paying homage to people and artists we love and respect — it's that simple!"

You can read Kim's full apology here:

"Aaliyah was such an amazing singer and she will forever be a music legend. I saw online that some people were offended by my Aaliyah costume and I am sorry if that offended anyone, but I wasn't dressing up as a race or culture, but rather as a woman I admire and think is amazing, so I don't agree honestly. I play all kinds of music in my home and I like for my kids to be exposed to many different artists as options for our Halloween costumes. We don't see color in my home. It's all love and respect. Kourtney was Michael Jackson for one of her costumes and she wasn't criticized. My son was Axel Rose. We are just paying homage to people and artists we love and respect — it's that simple!"

A representative for Kim Kardashian West declined to comment following INSIDER's request.
